column1: Local Foods////It's an understatement on how much I love Local Foods. I recommend the Asian Chicken Salad
column2: dressing on the side so it doesn't get too soggy. The fried cauliflower starter is very yummy as well. I really want to try other things
column3: but I cannot steer away from that salad. I have heard that the Garden Sammie is amazing
column4: and my cousin raves about the crunchy chicken sandwich which chips and kale (literally her go to order). Also
column6: any sandwich can be prepared as a salad!
